name: 孫卓勳
objective:
1.高頻介質材料特性 2.介質共振器簡介 3.圓柱型介電波導理論
4.簡易共振模型分析法 5.精密分析法 6.介質共振器耦合特性
7.介質共振器之高頻電路應用
schedule:
2 weeks  Characteristics of High-frequency dielectric materials
2 weeks  Introduction of dielectric resonators
4 weeks  Theory of cylindrical dielectric waveguides
4 weeks  Simple resonate model for analysis
3 weeks  Coupling
2 weeks  Practical applications
scorePolicy:
Attendence and assignment: 20%
Case study with presentation (2 times): 50%
Final report or Exam: 30%
materials:
1. Dielectric Resonator (D. Kajfez and  P. Guillon)
2. Microwave Engineering   (D.M. Pozar)
